sentence: His Senate picks for Georgia (Herschel Walker), Pennsylvania (Sean Parnell), and North Carolina (Ted Budd) have already muddled GOP chances in three of the most important races.
title: It's starting to occur to Trump that some of his endorsements have proven subpar

sentence: Walker campaign manager Scott Paradise touted that "this massive fundraising haul, likely the largest in the country for a non-incumbent, shows that Georgia Republicans are clearly united behind Herschel Walker and are ready to take on Senator Warnock."
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump-backed Herschel Walker reports hauling in nearly $10M since launching GOP Senate bid in Georgia

sentence: So far, she has backed Starbuck, Collins, Vance, Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker, Illinois Rep. Mary Miller, North Carolina House candidate Bo Hines, and Florida House candidate Anthony Sabatini.
author: Paul Bedard
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene backs Robby Starbuck, Ortagus not worthy of Trump support

sentence: Trump-backed Georgia Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker raised almost $5.4 million in the past three months and has about the same amount in the bank.
title: candidates are getting 'crushed' in early fundraising: report

author: Heather Hamilton
title: Single most dangerous time: Trump blasts climate change, CRT, and KBJ

sentence: Theres no upside to debate, said Jason Shepherd, the chair of the Republican Party in Cobb County, Ga., if youre someone like Herschel Walker who is already the frontrunner and has no experience debating.
title: Debate-dodging takes off in midterm campaigns

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Trump recently endorsed former television host Mehmet Oz (R) to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey (R) He also is backing former football star Herschel Walker (R) in the Georgia race against Sen. Raphael Warnock (D).
author: Elizabeth Crisp
title: Trump approval ratings still strong in key battleground states: poll

sentence: Trump-endorsed Georgia candidate follows Trumpian tradition of lying about everything all the time Fresh off revelations that Herschel Walker lied about graduating at the top of his class from the University of Georgia when, in fact, he didnt graduate at all, comes a new report from the Daily Beast that the U.S. Senate candidate has a habit of claiming to own businesses that dont appear to exist in the literal sense.
author: Bess Levin
title: Trumps Former Chief of Staff Wont Be Able to (Allegedly) Commit Voter Fraud in North Carolina Anymore

sentence: EXCLUSIVE: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker racked up another impressive fundraising haul for his Senate campaign as he tries to unseat Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia in November's midterm elections.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump-backed Herschel Walker raises $5.5M the past three months in his GOP Senate bid in Georgia

sentence: Finally, Republicans who refuse to show up for debates, such as Senate candidates Herschel Walker in Georgia and Rep. Ted Budd in North Carolina, should be asked at every opportunity why they are hiding.
title: Opinion: The media still havent learned how to cover the GOP threat to democracy

sentence: ATLANTA (AP) Herschel Walker is expected to skip a second debate against his Republican rivals for a crucial U.S. Senate seat on Tuesday after missing the first one.

title: Herschel Walker, other candidates test skipping debates

sentence: And on Tuesday, Herschel Walker is expected to miss a second debate against his Republican rivals for a crucial U.S. Senate seat after skipping the first one.
title: Candidates test skipping debates without upsetting voters

sentence: Warnock is likely to face former NFL running back Herschel Walker (R) in the fall.

title: Republicans reserve $53M in TV ads in bid to win Senate

sentence: The former president has been savvy with some of his endorsements, allying himself with candidates who already have high profiles (including Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker for Senate in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively) or bestowing his approval at crucial times (as he did at the last minute for Mr. Mastriano, who was already leading).
author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: The Limits of Stop the Steal

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker is all but guaranteed to win the GOP Senate primary, setting up a general election match-up with Sen. Raphael Warnock (D) in November.

sentence: Even though polls point to a Perdue loss, Trump's endorsed candidate in the state's Senate primary, former football star Herschel Walker, remains the overwhelming favorite.

sentence: His early support helped football great Herschel Walker and Rep. Ted Budd sail to their respective Senate primary nominations in Georgia and North Carolina.

title: Trump is in the past': Mounting losses show limits of power
